```{r}
library(sf)

# 你的 ZIP 链接
url <- "https://github.com/JiayiCheng-UCL/CASA0005/raw/refs/heads/main/evictions/shape.zip"

# 1. 下载 zip
tmp <- tempfile(fileext = ".zip")
download.file(url, tmp, mode = "wb")

# 2. 解压
unzipped_dir <- tempdir()
unzip(tmp, exdir = unzipped_dir)

# 3. 在解压目录中自动寻找 .shp 文件
shp_path <- list.files(
  unzipped_dir,
  pattern = "\\.shp$",
  recursive = TRUE,
  full.names = TRUE
)

print(shp_path)  # 看看找到的是哪个 .shp

# 4. 读取 shapefile
nycd <- st_read(shp_path[1])

# 5. 画图
plot(nycd$geometry, main = "NYCD Shapefile")

```
